name: Flickin' Boogers
description:
We dug deep to bring you this bit of gold.

We will help you move your Booger Flicking habit from the driver's seat of your car to the safety of your phone.

Precision is needed here - no casual flicking.

Watch the power bar to gauge the strength of your flickings.

Watch as a surprising set of characters parade by your virtual window.

No one will be safe from your sharp-shooting booger-flicking skills.

You only get three boogers a game - but if you run out - don't worry.

We'll make more.
